required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Multi-dose Group, Parallel Group and Placebo Controlled Phase Ib-IIa Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Antiplatelet Thrombolysin for Injection for the Treatment of Patients With Non-ST Segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction (NSTEMI).

brief_summary.textblock: Investigate the safety and efficacy of Anfibatide in non-ST segment myocardial infarction patients

detailed_description.textblock:
1. This study is a phase Ib-IIa exploratory study to observe the safety of Antiplatelet Thrombolysin for Injection for the treatment of non-ST segment myocardial infarction (NSTEMI) patients and preliminarily evaluate the efficacy of different doses, providing the theoretical basis of the phase II and III clinical study protocol.
2. To investigate the pharmacokinetics of different doses.

primary_outcome.description: The inhibition of ristocetin-induced platelet aggregation as measured by whole blood impedance aggregometr in vitro.
Bleeding events classified according to the Bleeding Academic Research Consortium (BARC) .

secondary_outcome.description: all-cause mortality, relapse of nonfatal myocardial infarction, nonfatal stroke, second target vascular reconstructio.
Degree of thrombocytopenia; Moderate (<100,000 platelets/mm3); Severe (<50,000 platelets/mm3); Extremely severe (<20,000 platelets/mm3)
The proportion of TIMI from grade 0 to 3 Pre -and post-PCI was evaluated.
The values of CTFC were evaluated and compared between groups.
The proportion of TMPG from grade 0 to 3 Pre -and post-PCI was evaluated.

arm_group.description: Bolus injection will be finished in 5 minutes immediately when the guidewire passes through the first stenosed vessel; bolus injection of different doses+0.002IU/kg/h intravenous infusion for 48h
Bolus injection will be finished in 5 minutes immediately when the guidewire passes through the first stenosed vessel; bolus injection of different doses+0.002IU/kg/h intravenous infusion for 48h
